api package

Submodules

api.fast module

FastApi configuration for BeeTector.

This module provides functions for FastApi to accept user inputs of images.

Functions

create_upload_file(file: UploadFile = File(…))

Accepts an image into the variable file: UploadFile = File(…) an stores it locally. It has the endpoint /upload_image/.

get_predict(img_path)

Gets model predcition on the image stored in img_path.

async api.fast.create_upload_file(file: UploadFile = File(PydanticUndefined))[source]

This endpoint accepts an image file upload. It saves the uploaded image to a local file.
